rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses an idiom ('had taken flight') and a moderate verb ('reported'), lacking high-potency framing.
Contains scale ('more than 230 counties in 37 states and at least six Canadian provinces') but no moderate verb describing impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports spread (negative fact) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports spread/impact, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Reports spread by date ('By April 18') and locations ('more than 230 counties in 37 states and at least six Canadian provinces'), factually reporting metrics.
